experience.title: experience
experience.description: I have 3+ years of experience as a front-end developer. Currently i am working as a VueJs developer at Al-Nafi E-learning platform.

frontend-skills.title: frontend-skills
frontend-skills.description:
I mostly use Nuxt3 and Tailwind to develop web application but I'm also familiar with React and other new frameworks.

I have deep understanding of DOM rendering and all types of rendering and routing strategies.

backend-skills.title: backend-skills
